message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a one-of-a-kind product. I'm willing to let it go for $1500000. I believe this price reflects its exceptional value and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, your product seems interesting, but $1500000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to offer $1100000 for it, which is still a good price considering its unique nature.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1300000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Let's see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, $1300000 is still a bit high for me.  I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm really hoping to stay closer to $1100000.  Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $1200000?  This would be a good deal for both of us.

I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, but I'm not quite ready to go any lower than that. Let me think for a moment... How about we meet at $1250000? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit on this sale.
